description: Details of ventilation system pursuant to condition 16 of planning permission ref: P/2014/3193 dated 25.05.2017 for Redevelopment of land to the rear of 11-15 The Mall to provide a part single, part two, part three, part four and part five storey building with basement, comprising 14 self contained flats (6x1 bed, 6x2 bed and 2x3 bed) arranged over the first to fourth floor (following demolition of the existing extensions and structures to the rear of 11-15). Proposed A3 use (restaurant) at basement, existing A3 restaurant use at ground floor of 13 The Mall to be extended into the rear of 12 The Mall, change of use of ground floor of 12 The Mall from A1 retail to C3 residential (to form entrance lobby to flats), to include alterations to existing air extract plant of 11, 12 & 13. One disabled parking space, bicycle, refuse & recycling stores.
